Name: Gone: Survival
About the game: Before you opens a large open world with many mysteries and secrets. To survive in this dangerous world you need to collect food, water, medicines, equipment and weapons, as well as grow plants. You will have the opportunity to complete tasks in order to earn experience and discover new items for crafting. Kill zombies and clear locations. Grab, Fight, Survive Build your shelters, creating a safe zone where you can wait out the impending danger.
Meta Title: Gone: Survival: Oct 20, 2020, Coden Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Gone: Survival? Check out the release date (Oct 20, 2020), developer insights from Coden Studio, and a complete game summary.
